Name: Bon Accord
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Joseph Cartron Double Crème de Cassis de Bourgogne
1 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Based on cognac with half as much scotch, this boozy cocktail is made special by aromatised wine and rich crème de cassis.
History: Created 2015 by Scott Liddle at Strata, Glasgow, Scotland.
Nutrition: One serving of Bon Accord contains 143 calories
